title: [K-12] Cloud and Mobile Computing Practical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming and network concepts
context.additional_context: Constructivist activity design optimized for smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Analyze cloud infrastructure components and design mobile environment application cases

Within four weeks, learners can identify three data synchronization issues in distributed computing environments (e.g., Apache Kafka, RabbitMQ), develop code-based solutions (under 50 lines) for each, and receive a suitability evaluation score of 80% or higher in team code reviews.

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
